products.name: Coconut Juice
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based beverages, Fruit-based beverages, Juices and nectars, Fruit juices, Non-alcoholic beverages, fr:Jus-de-coco
products.packaging: Can, Drink can, Tidyman wastebasket, fr:Point vert, fr:Triman
products.facts: ["Coconut juice is typically packaged in recyclable materials such as Tetra Pak or glass bottles.","Coconuts are grown in tropical regions, often requiring less water than other crops, making them a more sustainable choice.","High-quality coconut juice is extracted from young green coconuts, ensuring a fresh and natural taste without additives.","Coconut juice is rich in electrolytes and is often marketed as a natural sports drink, promoting hydration and health."]

products.name: Pineapple Chunks In Its Own Juice
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fruits and vegetables based foods, Canned foods, Canned plant-based foods, Fruits based foods, Fruits, Canned fruits, Tropical fruits, Pineapple, en:canned-fruits-in-juice
products.facts: ["Pineapple chunks in its own juice are typically made from fresh, ripe pineapples without added sugars or preservatives.","The packaging for pineapple chunks often uses recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendliness.","Canned pineapple chunks retain most of the nutrients found in fresh pineapples, including vitamin C and manganese.","The production process for canned pineapple is designed to minimize waste and optimize resource use, contributing to sustainable practices."]

products.name: Peanut Butter, creamy
products.facts: ["Peanut butter is made primarily from roasted peanuts, which are ground into a creamy or chunky paste.","Peanuts are legumes, which means they can improve soil health by fixing nitrogen, making them a more sustainable crop compared to some nuts.","Many peanut butter brands offer organic options, ensuring that peanuts are grown without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers.","Quality peanut butter should contain minimal ingredients, typically just peanuts and salt, to avoid added sugars and hydrogenated oils."]

products.name: Almond Breeze Almondmilk Unsweetened Original Aseptic
products.brands: Almond Breeze,Blue Diamond Almonds,Blue Diamond Growers Corporation, Blue Diamond
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based foods, Dairies, Dairy substitutes, Milk substitutes, Nuts and their products, Plant-based beverages, Milks, Plant-based milk alternatives, Nut-based drinks, Almond-based drinks
products.labels: Vegetarian,No GMOs,Vegan,FSC,No lactose,No soy,Non GMO project,Rainforest Alliance,No gluten
products.facts: ["Made from real almonds, providing a dairy-free alternative to milk.","Packaged in a recyclable aseptic container to reduce environmental impact.","Free from added sugars, making it a healthier choice for those monitoring their sugar intake.","Contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring a clean label and high quality."]

products.name: Nabisco belvita cookies cinnamon brown sugar 1x1.76 oz
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain oats and wheat flour.","Contains no high fructose corn syrup or artificial flavors.","Individually packaged for on-the-go convenience.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness."]

products.name: Fig Bar Raspberry
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Snacks,Sweet snacks,Bars,Barres,Barres aux fruits,Snacks sucrés
products.labels: Kosher,No GMOs,No lactose,No milk,No Trans Fat,Non GMO project,Orthodox Union Kosher,No high fructose syrup
products.facts: ["Made with real raspberry fruit for authentic flavor.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Certified non-GMO, ensuring high-quality ingredients."]

products.name: Plain Bagels
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Cereals and potatoes,Breads,Special breads,Bagel breads
products.facts: ["Plain Bagels are typically made from simple ingredients such as flour, water, yeast, and salt.","The production of bagels often involves boiling the dough before baking, which enhances their texture and flavor.","Many bagel brands prioritize sustainable sourcing of ingredients, reducing their ecological footprint.","Plain Bagels are generally low in fat and can be a good source of carbohydrates, making them a popular choice for a quick snack or breakfast."]

products.name: Creamy Almond Butter
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality, roasted almonds.","Contains no added sugars or preservatives.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Rich in healthy fats, protein, and essential nutrients."]

products.name: Dr Pepper
products.facts: ["Dr Pepper is packaged in aluminum cans, which are 100% recyclable and can be recycled indefinitely without loss of quality.","The beverage is made with a blend of 23 flavors, contributing to its unique taste profile and market differentiation.","Dr Pepper's production processes aim to reduce water usage and energy consumption, aligning with eco-friendly practices.","The brand has committed to sustainable sourcing of ingredients and reducing its carbon footprint in packaging and distribution."]

products.name: Fine Ground Sea Salt Almond Flour Crackers
products.labels: No gluten, Vegetarian, No GMOs, Vegan, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with fine ground sea salt and almond flour for a gluten-free option.","Contains no artificial preservatives or flavors, ensuring a natural snack.","Sourced from sustainable ingredients, promoting ecological responsibility.","Crafted with high-quality almonds, providing a rich source of protein and healthy fats."]

products.name: Baby Plum Tomatoes
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fruits and vegetables based foods, Vegetables based foods, Vegetables, Tomatoes and their products, Tomatoes, Baby Plum Tomatoes, en:fresh-tomatoes
products.facts: ["Baby Plum Tomatoes are typically grown in greenhouses to ensure optimal growing conditions.","They are often cultivated using sustainable farming practices to minimize environmental impact.","These tomatoes are rich in vitamins A and C, making them a healthy snack option.","Baby Plum Tomatoes have a lower water content than regular tomatoes, resulting in a sweeter flavor and firmer texture."]
